name: Baila Edwards
text: This place is the biggest army surplus store I’ve ever been to. It’s basically military goodwill and has a TON of options on uniforms and other items, including uniform items currently in rotation! I got a used pair of OCP pants that will probably fit better than my issued ones.

name: Brian rosenthal
text: If it had AC would be rated higher lol its hot in there

name: Arnold Clewell
text: They don't have EVERYTHING, but they have lots of cool stuff. Well worth a visit.

name: Theodore Russell
text: I called and asked if they had a poncho and they said they had a stack of them. I drove out there and when I arrived they said “oh I thought you meant a poncho liner” I specifically asked if they had ponchos, and mentioned I was not looking for the liners. I wasted an hour and a half round trip easily.

name: lynn bobik
text: Best place to find real military surplus. Busy, knowledgeable owner. Friendly staff.

name: Jerome Heck
text: Place is run down and dark cant find anything and when you do stuff is mostly damaged or in need of repairs. Not worth the time

name: KEN BURNS
text:
Not what we were hoping to see. More like a second hand store. Seems like the employees could spend some time straightening stuff up.
Oh well

name: MICHELLE BURNS
text: I saw Kaufman's Army Supply advertised on tv so we took a drive to Samson. This is a hugh building packed with military surplus.  Two-thirds of the building is closed off with storage and marked "employees only". The one-third of floor space, with four rows of retail shopping, was just too cluttered in my opinion. Prices were decent, good selection of clothing, and tons of ammo cans. For me it was not worth the 35 mile drive. Plus, it was so cold in the building I had to step outside to get my coat.

name: John Kennedy
text: This place has everything that you've been looking for, and things that you never knew you needed

name: Philip Truitt
text: Incredibly large and very economical prices!!!

name: brenda mccollough
text: hey google I wasn't at Hoffman's army surplus I was at Trinity Church. You think you know it all

name: Zach
text: Has got what you need.

name: Billy Conoway
text: Ok not bad.

name: joseph B
text: Best military gear around!

name: Brian Wallace
text: Overpriced

name: Jacob Curry
text: Love this place!

name: Summer Smith
text: I absolutely LOVE this store. I always leave with something. They have the best selection for nerdy people like me, Harry Potter, Game of Thrones, marvel, DC, Disney, ETC. they have a little of everything, the things I listed are just the things I’m interested in. They have way more that just that’ I go here at least once every 2 weeks to look at the new merchandise and chat with the VERY friendly staff.

name: Anna Egner
text: I love this store! They have so much awesome fandom merchandise and the employees are always so nice and helpful. I always have a great experience in this store.

name: Victoria Mystic
text: So many finds, pricy though!

name: Ivy Sanderson
text: Great selection of different fandoms and service was excellent! Loved the wall of keychains!!

name: Michelle Harris
text: I will never shop at this store again.

name: Cathy Chandler
text: There is such a variety of merchandise. Jeff is a pleasure to do business with. It has to be the best kept secret in Gadsden. You need to go by there to look for new, used, antique, unusual, jewelry, daycare products toys and more!!! I love that place. Located in the old Sticks and Stuff building across the interstate from Gadsden City High School.

name: Justin Guyton
text: Great place to take your time & enjoy looking at everything.  The two guys were helpfull & friendly. Surprised how stress free the enivorment was with the vendors being so postive Ive become a regular Im in there several times a week & glad to see how much they have added to the place.

name: Gary Johnson
text: This place sells nothing but junk and stuff that don't work...... And then they wanna say all sells at final... That's bad business and a rip off.....i strongly offer everyone not to buy anything from them.......

name: John Walker
text: Some good stuff but lots of junk too

name: Brian Rodgers
text: Lots of interesting unique vintage items.

name: Paula Stewart
text: Going out of business

name: Sherry Rylander
text: Closed.

name: Jill Scott
text: If you are looking for the most knowledgable, honest dealer in coins this is the business to go to. I was so impressed! Thank you!

name: Chris Manley
text: Owner is extremely knowledgeable and friendly and fair when buying or selling. Would recommend you visit the shop for your silver needs.

name: Brian Thompson
text: Stopped in yesterday and purchased a CML, very fair prices, especially for the current day market. I will not go to any other coin shop in town, David is now my go to! (Even better prices that online bullion dealers depending on the product.) He can help you find what you want!

name: Will Byrd
text:
While on a short road trip for work, I stopped here because it had 5 stars, and great comments. After entering the store, I realized that the great comments were true. The prices were great, and had a variety of  items.
David has a great personality, is knowledgable about coins, bullion, and the coin collecting community in general. I will be back anytime that I am in the area.

name: Heidi Boutwell
text: I had a great experience here! The guy that owns it is very friendly and knowledgeable!

name: Jessica Byrd
text: Great service, great selection, great prices.

name: Joel carpenter
text: Went here with my sister to get a coin collection appraisal and just to learn some knowledge. The staff was very helpful and after going to more than one coin shop found the prices to sell gold and silver here to be higher than other places in town. The owner was very patient with us and answered any and all of my questions to the best of his knowledge and even text and called other dealers to get answers and 2nd opinions on some of my more rare coins to make me feel better. When I do decide to sell our collection I will be calling here to give them the first crack at buying everything. I highly recommend.

name: Jerry Gray
text: David is a very knowledgable person. He is honest, easy going, not pushy and will give the best prices anywhere. I highly recommend him for any coin or bullion needs.

name: john smith
text: This is hands down the best coin shop in Alabama! David’s prices are extremely fair and you feel good doing business with him. It’s really nice to have a shop that you can trust!!!

name: Martin Harris
text: I wish I had the Alabama Coin Shop closer to me but the drive was well worth it. David was very helpful and made my coin hunt fun. The prices are very fair. Highly recommend you give David a visit.

name: James Hayes
text: This is the best place to take your money too. You can buy old coins and old PAPER money the guy is helpful BUT DO YOUR HOMEWORK FIRST .

text: Best coin and bullion buying/selling experience I've ever had 👌🏻 Fair prices.

name: Parker McGee
text: Had an awesome experience recently. Got a discount for multiple games and got to support a local business! Owner is a great guy.

name: Zack Whiting
text: Great place to get all types of games. Very friendly. Great deals. Highly recommend. Me and my wife messed up our purchase at the flea market but we were able to go visit the store and make things right. Definitely much appreciated.

name: Jp
text: Owner was awesome! Super personable and a joy to talk too. Owner was super knowledgeable and made our visit memorable.

name: Brian Taylor
text: Game-N-Trade is hands down my favorite video game shop. I drive from Daphne to visit his shop near the University of South AL and his booth at the Flea Market in Mobile. I do this because Scott, the proprietor, is not only knowledgeable but also genuinely friendly and accommodating! I have been a customer of his for many years and have purchased an Xbox 360, Xbox 1, Nintendo 64, Wii, and, more recently, the hard to find Nintendo Switch. Besides selling consoles dating back to the ’80s (Nintendo, Sega, Etc.) Scott has a vast selection of games and accessories for all the consoles. Plus, he has repaired my phone screen more times than I can count. Scott provides returning customers with great discounts and bundle deals. He has also offered me store credit or trades that I’m comfortable with; Unlike the unsatisfying offers, other establishments offer that will leave one feeling remorseful. Game-N-Trade also has a selection of comics and figurines, but I don’t know much about those. So, cheers to Scott and Game-N-Trade for making my family and me delighted customers. I’m confident once you visit his unique establishment and see the quality merchandise at exceptional prices, you’ll understand why he has so many satisfied, returning customers. I’ve seen the smiling faces when they enter and depart Game-N-Trade!

name: Emphias Ramillion (Emphias)
text: Owner is very nice and offers fair trades for in store or cash. The shop is a must see if you're a gamer.

name: Sedgwick M. Pritchett
text: Dope Lil spot with a cool owner.

name: Mark Petite
text: Great people love their business

name: Aj Braxton
text: Talked to the owner over the phone about a game that he said he had. I drove 30 minutes to get the game and he didn’t have it.

text: Tons of hidden gems, really nice owner, knowledgeable staff and owner. Has a store and a booth at the flea market!  I always get a fair deal there and default to them for my game needs!

name: Eric S
text: We visit lots of antique stores, just to see the history, get ideas for future purchases or even sometimes buy something. Every store tends to have unique finds and such is the case at 810 Antiques. We made our first major purchase here and was very happy with the price and knowledge of the owner. Must stop among your antique store visits.

name: Christina Bradford
text: We dropped in not really knowing what we were looking for and left with things we fell in love with— AND at fantastic prices! The owner was very hospitable and helpful. There was a wide variety of items and all well organized and easy to see. Will definitely be going back!

name: Sarah Curbow
text: He was very personal and willing to talk and work with you on prices if you seen something you really loved. The selection was diverse and he had things I've never seen before and displayed in such a way it was easy and comfortable to look at everything available.

name: Lee Ann Michelle
text: Awesome treasures to be found here.

resp.text: Thanks for shopping with us!

name: John Owen
text: Get store, enjoyed looking around

name: Ellen George
text: Great antique shop with plenty to look at! My one recommendation would be to shut the doors and mark areas that customers are not supposed to be in. Several of the store rooms were open and it was a little difficult to tell if I was allowed to be in there or not.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback, Ellen! We will work on getting some signs posted to make things a little more clear. We try to talk to everyone who comes through the door to let them know we're still a work in progress and apologize for the mess in the meantime. Some days are a bit busier than others, so we apologize for not making it clear every room (on the first level as of now) is open to explore (outside of our utility closet in the back corner-- making a sign is on today's to do list!). Thanks for shopping with us, and we hope you will come back to see us!

name: Tim Earwood
text: Excellent place for unique antiques and primitives , large selection and the owner is really nice

resp.text: Thanks for shopping with us, Tim. We enjoy doing business with you!

name: Frank Kirsch
text: Nice quality items.

resp.text: Thank you for shopping with us, Frank. We hope you will come back!

text: We always love shopping at Auburn Art. Everyone who works there is incredibly friendly, and I love all of the artwork and kitchenware.

name: Sam Keske
text: Classiest spot for Auburn art, decorations, and gifts (and nicer than any of the bookstores). Also make high-quality custom diploma frames, and have the best selection of Christmas ornaments every year. One of the longest running shops in Toomer's Corner for a reason. Love it!

name: Nate Conkey
text: A bit pricey, but quality stuff

name: Katy Doss
text: A great store for all things Auburn, and a must-stop for gamedays!

name: Matthew Golia
text:
The owners are amazing. There taken for picking the correct frames is uncanny. They specialize in concert posters who frame matching can be quite difficult owing to the fact that the artists have complex images, a varied array of colors and countless shapes and sizes.

Price, selection, service and speed all top notch. This is the place to get your pictures framed. No doubt.

Mahalo!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words!!!!   Hope to see you back in here soon.

name: Coffee News Pine Belt
text:
Detailed, Professional, Top Grade Materials
I met the owner while working together with a service group where we helped single mothers in need. Anyone with that kind of heart deserves my business!
We now use The Beveled Edge for all of our awards, gifts for customers and even our personal family things.
Their attention to detail is awesome! And all wood and matting is top notch.
(my photos don't show how beautiful the work is and I don't have a pic of any of the award. They are super professional).

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words, as well as your business.

name: Page Weinstein
text: THIS PLACE IS INCREDIBLE! I had 5 pictures framed and I was completely shocked with how affordable and amazing they looked. Not to mention they were so great to work with. Thanks to UPS the glass broke.... but when I called this store they helped me with my claim and offered to re do them! incredible service, 10/10. best in Alabama!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words and your business.  We really appreciate it!!

name: Steve Russell
text: Chris always does a great job for me. He has been framing my artwork for years. I appreciate his fast service and help. Always a pleasure doing business with him.

resp.text: Thanks so much, we really appreciate your business.

name: Nicole Hall
text: I LOVE THE BEVELED EDGE! I have been using Chris for ALL my framing needs for years. He is very welcoming and makes you feel as though you are long time friends :) Work is impeccable (hence the returning customer status) and he really has an eye for matching color schemes! HIGHLY RECOMMEND

resp.text: Thanks Nikki, we appreciate the kind words.

text: The Beveled Edge is by far the finest Framing Shop in town.  Mr. Chris has a legendary selection of Roll Tide memorabilia for even the most discerning of palates.  Top marks for staff friendliness, quick delivery, and quality work.

resp.text: Thanks so much Cliff, I appreciate your business.

text: They did not answer the phone I got hung up on 6 times in a row

name: Rockman DS
text: As many of the horror stories I'm sure people spread about these stores well that's not always true I've always had a good experience going to these stores. I've been a regular at three different locations since they've been around and I am always treated good it really boils down to the people on both sides. I would recommend stopping in and getting to know these guys I transferred to them when my local store closed and they've been doing me right every since, keep up the good work guys!

name: Bryan Davis
text: It was a decent experience. I kind of felt ostracized but the customers and employees. Though accommodating I felt as if they were peering into my soul with the judging eyes ever vigilant and knowing the deep down in my soul I was not nerdy enough to be in their presence.... but I want to be

name: Tina Overton
text: Took my sister from Knoxville Tennessee an bought her a pair of nike's an me Tommy sandals cause I had the brown,So I had too have the black,Looking for these,suggested you have some on at the store too help match up an make each person's there on style an color,or colors.Id pay extra for it.

name: Jennifer McCain
text: My husband and I have been avidly loyal customers since the opening of this location. As such, We are used to being treated a certain way by the staff when we visit the store. Today was NOT a pleasant visit, as the girl at the register had an attitude from the start as, as if our coming in was an inconvenience to her. We were trying to trade in an Xbox 360 for store credit towards our layaway purchases. She proceeded to tell us she could not take the system because of bugs, which we do not have in our home. Admittedly, the system sat in our closet collecting dust, dirt, and dog hair for 2 years. I explained this to her to be told "I'm looking at bug legs and droppings." I argued the fact and proved my case by pulling out the dog hair to show her. She already had her mind made up that she wouldn't help us and couldn't fathom the idea that she was wrong. I guarantee this... my next visit to the Pell City store, if she's working the counter, I will walk out. I will refuse to deal with her ever again. She was very rude, snide, and ignorant. Since the staff change, we have stopped going unless absolutely necessary! I would love to have her job, and actually do the job correctly, if management would let her go! Customer service should be top priority ALWAYS! We will not be back until she is gone!

name: TheGamingWife
text: After being a customer for about 10+ years this store has been declining slowly in the customer service department. While i understand they are only trying to make sells there comes a time when trying to get someone to buy something should stop, especially when the customer claims to not be interested.

name: Lara Polk
text: Was not very happy with the service only had one person to take care of everybody. The stores is hard to maneuver around. Definitely could use a bigger space

name: Joe Earnest
text: Great knowledge of the staff about up and coming games

name: Murray Fuller
text: Great place for gaming info and all your gaming needs

name: Dan Gunter
text: Very great place for your video game needs.

name: ryan webber
text: Employees are very nice and knowledgeable about games and other "nerdy" stuff.

name: Hunter Shaddix
text: Love people and the atmosphere. Great place to get and talk about games.

name: Matthew “Default” Bontemps
text: The staff is very knowledgeable, helpful and courteous

name: Brian Parton
text: Staff are very friendly and knowledgeable. Very good selection and returns policy, and a rewards system for repeat customers.

name: Yolanda Chasteen
text: Bought something for a Christmas gift that I ended up not needing.   Took it back for a refund and was told they couldn't refund it, even though I had my receipt. They gave me a gift card that I will never use so I should have just flushed my money down the toilet.

name: Brittany Sullivan
text: Good place to go if you like games, and have kids who want updated games. Trade ins, and new stuff. Prices are reasonable.

name: Sage Zetsu
text: Great service and very helpful employees

name: RollTide Fan
text: Not the biggest fan of GameStop but the locals that work here are always helpful and knowledgeable

name: Stacey Smith
text: Great folks treat you like family. Great deals too! Beautiful retro decor. Gorgeous sets of, your great grandmother's dishes, carnival glass, war relics. Arts and craft supplies, home improvements, from breakers to light fixtures. And a pet section too. Oh yes power tools. I can get lost,all day, in this establishment.

name: Frederick Joe Johnston
text: Much more than I expected in this huge second hand store. As for female clothing and items, there was something interesting  because I had to make two trips back in to retrieve my girlfriend. I went in for a motorcycle helmet and left with one. So being the simple man I am,  I'm happy. There was many manly  things ( ie. -Tools, electronics) I would have taken closer look at , but it can get expensive shopping with female,  so it will have to be another time.

name: Ken S
text: I go every weekend.  They are very nice people. Good prices and a huge variety of stuff new and used.

name: Teser Hepet
text: I love Bargain City! I'm always finding something that is useful every time I'm there. Wish they were open at least two more days out the week. It's hard to catched them do to mi work schedule. Everyone I tell give thanks for telling

name: Ronnie Bill
text:
Super
The best place.
With great customer service

name: Christina Wolfe
text: Always friendly service and the employees are always helpful!!! Love that they are always walking around checking on everyone asking if the customers need any help!!!

text: Everybody was helpful in ever way, nice place to shop for what  ever you need.

resp.text: a/c is now fixed sorry for the heat  lol thank you for coming

text: Owner is great this is a great place to shop at great prices!

text: Not as good as slocomb.

name: Lisa Marie Lyons
text: Ordered flowers for a graduation celebration. Wow! Beautiful, artistic, and eye catching. Delivered as requested. Thank you.

name: Miles Hudson
text: Great service with incredible flowers!

name: Luis Rosas
text: Beautiful Roses and decoration , very sweet lady , for a long time I’ve been trying to find a good florist every time I go see my girlfriend, and I think I finally found the one , my girlfriend love her roses and especially the chocolate they sell , I would give this 10 stars ⭐️... very satisfied with the product and will definitely will come again

name: Drew Harcrow
text: My wife uses them often for gifts and/or flowers. She loves the girls that work in there.

name: James Duvall
text: Beautiful arrangement, fair price. She really helped us out for my grandfather's funeral. Very satisfied.

name: Gary Braden
text: No thank you

name: Sean Mantler
text: Absolutely beautiful Christmas decorations and displays! Very friendly and attentive staff.

name: Elliott Varner
text:
So.... I was told by the owner of Tiger Lilly that he did his job and those flowers and exactly what I ordered. He then went on to tell me he went above and beyond by upgrading the vase and adding a bow. He then tells me that it isn't fair to him for me to bash him on social media. The post is on tiger Lilly's Facebook page under community comments. I am yet to see where I bashed him. Then he continues to inform me how you just cant make some people happy. Not one time did he offer any reparations, exchanges, refunds, discounts, or even an apology. So that's my experience with Slade Carden and Tiger Lilly.
When I pointed out that he had not apologized he offered a half hearted apology. I cancelled my other orders and will not do business here again.

name: Kyle Cochran
text: Tiger lily is the best  in town! They always exceed my expections! Make sure to call them for all your flower needs!

name: j play
text: Nice. Very accommodating

name: ゼロチャンZero
text:
I love how everyone here is really nice and accepting. You can always have a good time here with your buds!

Store owner and his son are really nice and relaxed, also really friendly.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: M.W.G Gaming
text: Great place to go and find a good community and great service

resp.text: Thanks Alex! Lol

name: Macy Bergen
text: i remember playing this game  a lot with my cousin when I was 5... Fireboy and Watergirl hudgames is great game

name: Ashley D
text: Love this place! They have a great selection and the service is awesome.

name: no thats my pinapple
text: The place is like a dream. I 100% recommend coming here for all your card and board game needs. The staff is awesome and the people are friendly.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Michael Hein
text: Owner is incredibly friendly. Great environment for table-top gaming. Popular with a variety of ages. If you're looking for a place to find or play games, Mini War Game is a fantastic option.

resp.text: Thank you Michael,  we really appreciate customers taking the time to share! Hope to see you again soon!

name: jacob Lambert
text: I go here for dungeons and dragons and to play magic. It's a great place John the owner couldn't be more friendly and enjoys helping people have fun. Great community for new and experienced players

resp.text: Thanks Jay  we love you too! ~Steph

name: BhOp AnOn
text: Visited from out of town and loved the shop. Super friendly staff.

name: Jenneffer Fenyes
text: I love Mini War Games. There are always customers at the tables playing games that anyone is welcome to spectate or (sometimes) join. It's great for Magic players and D&D. The owner is a very friendly guy who is more than happy to help newcomers set up their own adventures. Show up for the pre-release parties, they are always so much fun!

name: Tarktan
text: Very friendly staff and community. If you're looking for somewhere family friendly to play your favorite table top games this is the place.

name: Matthew Langley
text: Very welcoming. Lots of games to choose from. Great place to meet with friends to play D&D, board games, and/or card games.

name: James Rush
text: Great location, and the staff were very capable.  Prices are reasonable and the environment is great.

resp.text: Thanks James!

name: Matthew Stuart
text: Cool people with cool games 🤙🏼

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave a review!

name: Stephen Thomas
text: Came in for Magic The Gathering a few years back and have been a regular since. Wind up there roughly 5 days a week due to the sheer number of games able to be played. Staff is superbly helpful and if for some reason they don't already have what you're looking for they will go out of their way to obtain it that product for you. The clientele is some of the nicest in the area always willing to teach new players any game held in the shop or even bought into the store.

resp.text: Thanks Stephen!

name: Timothy Barnes
text: With all your tabletop gaming needs, a great community and an even better shop owner, this is the place to go. Not only is it a shop of trying and buying your tabletop games, but you can play them here too. There are always events and games going on just ask the shop owner.

name: Debra Mansmann
text: My grandchildren's  love it my son and daughter inlaw own it safe place to come and play strategy  games

name: Jonathon Mansmann
text: MWG is a great family friendly game store with a great selection of board, card and role playing games. Friendly and knowledgeable staff will help you find the perfect game. The play space is large enough to accommodate any size game group and there demo selection is impressive.

name: VikingAtom
text: Awesome place to hang out and talk to people and reasonably priced magic cards.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review,  I'm glad you had a good time! Hope to see you again soon.

name: Roy Miller
text: We were just passing though and saw mimi war games. My wife and I love all aming stuff so we stoped in. Owner was very friendly and inviting.  They carry just about all gaming. I highly recommend you stop by if you're a netd like me.

resp.text: Thank you Roy!

name: Philip Hegji
text: The owner is friendly and attentive but not overbearing.  The selection of games has steadily improved since they opened.

resp.text: Thank you,  I really appreciate you taking a minute to share your experience!

name: John Love
text: It's a great place to find new board games and to play Magic the Gathering

name: donald farnell
text: Mini war game is a great place for games and meeting new people. I've been a customer for 4 years and have always considered MWG my home game store and the other customers have become great friends!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Jasmine Terry
text: A great place to go nerd out and have some fun. They have a huge selecting if games and other fun stuff to keep you occupied.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Timothy Barnes
text: Good Owners, Good People, Good Fun. Dosn't cost a dime to make friends and enjoy fun games.

resp.text: Thanks Tim!

name: Jacob Burch
text: Awesome store owner is nice great people inside

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words and for taking the time to leave us a review =)

name: Eric Leisenring
text: Never a disappointment. Great fun, great staff and a place to play.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Kyle Wilson
text: The shop holds a wide variety of games such as warhammer, magic the gathering, and other one-off board games( though I tend gravitate to the pathfinder, dungeons and dragons, and the palladium section.) The staff is friendly and helpful( though I'm biased towards them since I know them). They have a shelf in the back full of board games so you could try before you buy. My one complaint is that it could get a little noisy during a role playing game or when two games are going at the same time.

resp.text: I'll be sure to  shuush you guys the next time ypu get loud, lol. Thanks Kyle.

name: Vanessa
text: I had no idea what to get a friend and the gents here were awesome and very helpful! I'm coming back for family game nights!

resp.text: Thanks Vanessa, see you again soon!

name: Maj (Majeemaj)
text: Very welcoming also a good place for pokemon go if you wanna catch high cp eevees

resp.text: Thanks!

name: OVERBOARD DM
text: Wish they had more miniatures. This coming from a dungeon Master though.

resp.text: We are always happy to order specific products for our customers,  the next time you are in please let me know what minis you are looking for! Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review!

name: Adimare
text: Amazing games cards and everything else

name: Caleb Leisenring
text: Fun environment and great people.

name: Robert Jeppesen
text: This is certainly the best gaming store in the region for board games,  RPGs, miniatures, Magic, and other card games. I regularly drive an hour from Pensacola to pay games here.

resp.text: Thank you Rob!

name: Brian O'Neill
text: Great game selection.

name: Wall Dropping Knowledge
text: Great owner, locally owned

resp.text: Thanks Jacob! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Ryan Russell
text: Friendly staff, assorted games of all kinds
